ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whats your record?
ygData.msgSnippet: I read an interesting post that theorized that random is seeded with your current loc.  This may be why it is so streaky sometimes.  When you get a missed note
ygData.messageBody:
I read an interesting post that theorized that random is seeded with your
current loc. This may be why it is so streaky sometimes. When you get a
missed note try moving slightly before trying again, it can't hurt :)

Rokenn


> -----Original Message-----

>
